trumpet.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a musical instrument that you blow into, which consists of a curved metal tube that is wide at the end, and three buttons you press to change the notes
trumpet.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to tell everyone about something that you are proud of, especially in an annoying way
trumpet.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: They are proudly trumpeting the fact that they are creating more jobs.
trumpet.translation[1].definitions[1].de: if an elephant trumpets, it makes a loud noise
